```
wordpress:
  container_name: my-wordpress-app
  image: wordpress
  ports:
    - "80:80"  
  links:
    - "mysql:mysql"
mysql:
  container_name: my-wordpress-database
  image: mysql
  environment:
    MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: "password"
```
